location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 17. MAP TO ILLUSTRATE THE ATTACK ON THE DUJAILA REDOUBT: 8TH. MARCH, 1916.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 230 x 325mm, on sheet 317 x 405mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume II, and shows a region around the Dujaila watercourse [Nahr ad Dujaylah] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, towns, settlements, rivers and marshes. A key in the lower right corner explains numbered locations on the map.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1924.
